recipe.name: Chicken & Mushroom Hotpot
recipe.description: A comforting British dish featuring tender chicken and mushrooms in a creamy sauce, topped with crispy, golden potato slices.
steps: Put the butter in a medium-size saucepan over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the mushrooms to the saucepan and continue cooking until softened.
Stir in the flour to form a thick paste (roux).
If using a stock cube, crumble it into the roux and stir well.
Cook the roux over low heat, stirring continuously for 2 minutes to eliminate the floury taste.
Slowly add 500ml of water (or fresh stock if not using a stock cube), stirring constantly.
Season with pepper, nutmeg, and mustard powder.
Return the saucepan to medium heat and bring to a boil, stirring continuously until the sauce thickens.
Reduce to low heat and add the cooked chicken and sweetcorn, stirring well.
Grease a medium-size ovenproof dish with a little butter and pour in the chicken and mushroom mixture.
Arrange the potato slices on top, overlapping slightly to cover the filling.
Brush the potatoes with melted butter.
Bake in the oven for about 35 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked and golden brown.
A job well done! Now enjoy your delicious dish.
